name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania ex rel. Stanley REBERT, Petitioner v. Stephen D. RAMBLER, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Rebert v. Rambler

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania ex rel. Stanley REBERT, Petitioner v. Stephen D. RAMBLER, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of August 2010, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as stated by petitioner, is:
The Superior Court erred as a matter of law when it vacated the trial court’s order on the basis that a federal conviction for felony mailing of extortionate communications did not constitute an infamous crime.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
3 A.3d 667
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania ex rel. Stanley REBERT, Petitioner v. Stephen D. RAMBLER, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 26, 2010.
